com.drismo.gui
Class GraphView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      com.drismo.gui.GraphView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback
public class GraphView
extends android.view.View

The class is taken from http://android.arnodenhond.com/components/graphview and modified by us. Used to display the qualitygraph of a trip.

See Also:
ViewTrip
